Preterit.text: lu+muxtār mʕaṭle ʕal u+ruʕyo dlo mičək ba+zyone; mʕaṭli ʕal i+barṯayḏi dlo mṣammo u+bayto

Infinitive/action noun.text: ʕyoṭo/teʕiṭo (Ilyas prefers ʕyoṭo, but is ready to accept teʕiṭo as a productive pattern)

idioms: durch Anschreien verscheuchen (Tier); (Ilyas knows the verb as used mostly about humans, not animals); scream, yell (as a feedback to something wrongly done)
